titles.title: ED ACCESS Act of 2022
ED ACCESS Act of 2022
Eliminating Discrimination And Creating Corridors to Expand Student Success Act of 2022
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to strike the provision of the American Opportunity Tax Credit that denies the credit to students with felony drug convictions.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Eliminating Discrimination And Creating Corridors to Expand Student Success Act of 2022 or the ED ACCESS Act of 2022
This bill repeals the prohibition against granting the American Opportunity Tax Credit to students with federal or state felony drug convictions.
